summary: The evolution of electronic music and its many genres. How the wide range of styles and scenes formed through experimentations on sound formation.
cast: Arthur Baker|Afrika Bambaataa|Carl Cox|David Kristian|Derrick May|Moby|Robert Moog|Giorgio Moroder|Genesis P-Orridge|Rob Playford|DJ Spooky|Karlheinz Stockhausen|Danny Tenaglia
keywords: love parade|electro music|hip hop|hardcore techno|techno music
title: Modulations
